entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 08:34 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: WSW 28 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
